title: Duplicate
writer: Robin Bhatt, Akash Khurana, Javed Siddiqui
short_cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Juhi Chawla, Sonali Bendre, Farida Jalal, Mohnish Bahl, Tiku Talsania, Gulshan Grover, Sharat Saxena
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Juhi Chawla, Sonali Bendre, Farida Jalal, Mohnish Bahl, Tiku Talsania, Gulshan Grover, Sharat Saxena
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas

desc: Hilarious mix-ups and deadly encounters ensue when a convict seeks to escape authorities by assuming the identity of his doppelgänger, a perky chef.
